title: FS: N172 Old Judge Bill Gleason Philadelphia
author: Yanks23

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Old Judge Bill Gleason Philadelphia
posts.post_content: SGC 3 graded Old Judge N172 Bill Gleason. VCP has two of these graded cards listed, not including this one. The highest is an SGC 2 that sold for $205 in 2015. $300 shipped in U.S., net to me. I will ship via USPS in a bubble envelope with tracking. If interested, please contact me at: [url]timwhitman@comcast.net[/url]. Thanks!
This one is no longer available. Thanks.
